AVEVA Group plc

Director/PDMR Shareholding

AVEVA Group plc announces that on 9 September 2021 it was notified of the following share option exercise and sale which took place:

Claire Denton, Group General Counsel and Company Secretary

On 9 September 2021 Ms Denton exercised options over 4 shares following the 2019 award under the AVEVA Group Deferred Share Bonus Plan , selling all resulting shares at a price of £41.36 per share.
